title: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: When launching the Help view on Windows 2000, the Tab key does not have any effect.
EB: When launching the Help view on Windows 2000, the Tab key should navigate through the elements on the page.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch the Help view on Windows 2000. 2. Press the Tab key and observe that it does not navigate through the elements on the page.
